turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yeah. I need to order a Starbucks coffee drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: just a regular ice coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Just a little half and half.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any sugars?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The closest Starbucks is the Cheyenne airport in Cheyenne, Wyoming.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me find one for you, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it looks like the one on central avenue is closest, is that ok with you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, it's not too bad.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i have ordered you a venti iced coffee with half and half to be picked up at the starbucks on central avenue, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
